3 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Vape: 5% - No Noticeable Changes from Wk 2

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Natural and Nutty. Amalgamation of a Roasted, Lightly Buttery Pecan and Roasted Peanut with a noticeable Lightly Earthy / Musty\* edge. Mild notes of a Tart, Tannic\* quality similar to Raw Walnut Skin throughout exhale. Moderately Light Body with a Soft, Relatively Smooth Mouth Feel.

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: Mellow Woody/Musty Note attached to Nut Flavor

‚Üí Off Note: ‚Üë wattage to 55 watts vs 40 watts noticeably ‚Üì‚Äôs off note

\- Nut Flavor not Chalky or Dry

\- Uses: Bakeries, Pastries, and Tobaccos < as a Pecan/Peanut Flavor

\- - - - - - - - -

‚ñ∫ Short Notes: 3% Tester

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Similar Sweetness and Buttery Roasted Pecan with Dry Peanut flavor as 5% tester but overall Thinner and Milder. Raw Walnut Tannic Qualities (not flavor) remain. Significantly Lighter\* Musty Off Note surrounding nut flavor but remains Identifiable at 40W. ‚Üë Wattage above 55 Watts diminishes off Note. Light\* Body with a Soft and Smooth Mouthfeel.
